name: POC Pharma
tagline: Technology Solutions for Pharmacies and their stakeholders
description:
POC Pharma is a SaaS company helping stakeholders in the Pharmacy Channel (drug manufacturers, distributors, wholesalers, pharmacies, payers...) digitally manage their interactions and collaborative workflows.

Workflow integration modules include:
- Trade program and trade offers management
- Content and information sharing
- Data integration and visualization
- Customized customer engagement
- Multichannel commercialization
- Order management
